Pre-Game Insights: A loss for either side could put their qualification hopes in doubt. The Kiwis are on a three-match losing streak, while the Men in Green have won their previous game against Bangladesh, ending a four-match losing streak of their own.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The live streaming of the game between Pakistan and New Zealand will be on Disney+ Hotstar. All the mobile users would be able to view the World Cup clash involving the hosts for free of cost on the Disney+ Hotstar mobile app.
